DOC.brief_summary: The study is a cross sectional, epidemiology study of disease severity for rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis and ankylosing spondylitis in four geographic regions in Australia (Illawarra, Sutherland, Hunter Urban and Hunter Rural).
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Epidemiology of Rheumatoid Arthritis, Psoriatic Arthritis and Ankylosing Spondylitis in Australia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria include: Adult patients with a diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis or ankylosing spondylitis who have visited a primary care centre within one of the specified catchment areas for their condition within the last 24 months.
